attributes.action: Medical staff of all ranking should seriously take notice of parents/guardians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my daughter bethany flowers died as a result of being taken to hosptal eight times in fifteen days with breathing diffculties, if the medics had taken my daughter and myself seriously rather than a rushed diagnosis and dismissing what wed said, should they have listened properly and took notice bethany may still be living today, they may be doctors of all experience but when a mother is insistant and consistant that their child is ill it should be taken seriously, a mother knows her child better than any doctor.lives of children can be saved if the child and parent are heard and not just listened too, this needs to be made a law and stop sending seriously ill children home time after time to suffer and basically left to die through misdiagnosis or lack of time and care. acton needs to take place now and stop other parents going through what my family and many others are.
